src:
Chelsea Siap Sikut MU untuk Jadon Sancho
06 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rencana Manchester United untuk merekrut Jadon Sancho nampaknya semakin sulit terealisasi. Klub Premier League lainnya, Chelsea diberitakan sangat tertarik memboyong sang winger.
Sosok 19 tahun itu memang menjadi pemain muda yang tengah bersinar di Bundesliga. Ia menjadi andalan di lini serang Borussia Dortmund dan sudah membuat 15 gol dan 19 assist dari total 42 penampilan di Bundesliga.
Kecemerlangan Sancho itu kabarnya membuat Setan Merah jatuh hati. Mereka diberitakan tertarik untuk mendatangkan sang winger ke Old Trafford tahun depan.
The Mirror mengklaim bahwa United mendapatkan perlawanan yang sengit dari Chelsea untuk transfer Sancho. Tim asal London Barat itu diberitakan sangat tertarik untuk merekrut sang winger.

Simak rencana transfer Chelsea untuk Sancho di bawah ini.
text:
Chelsea are ready to elbow MU for Jadon Sancho
Nov 6 2019, 18:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United's plan to recruit Jadon Sancho seems increasingly difficult to realize. Other Premier League clubs, Chelsea reportedly very interested in bringing the winger.
The 19-year-old is indeed a young player who is shining in the Bundesliga. He is a mainstay in the attack line Borussia Dortmund and has made 15 goals and 19 assists from a total of 42 appearances in the Bundesliga.
Sancho's brilliance reportedly made the Red Devils fall in love. They are reportedly interested in bringing the winger to Old Trafford next year.
The Mirror claims that United get fierce resistance from Chelsea for the Sancho transfer. The team from West London was reportedly very interested in recruiting the winger.

Check out Chelsea's transfer plan for Sancho below.
